description: 1 Notice/Trap name: Portal Max User Alarm
2 Notice/Trap generation cause: The number of portal users reached the maximum
3 Repair suggestions:

event.Summary: Portal user count reached maximum limit

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalMaxUserAlarm HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserSlot s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserNum i 9999 HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalPercentage i 9999

description: Slot
variables.name: HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserSlot

description: The number of portal users.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserNum

description: The number of portal alarm percentage.
variables.name: HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalPercentage

event.Summary: Portal user count below maximum limit

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserClearAlarm HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserSlot s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalUserNum i 9999 HUAWEI-PORTAL-MIB::hwPortalPercentage i 9999
